info.name: Live Discover API
info.description:
This is the OAS 3.0 specification for the Live Discover API in Sophos Central.

Contact Support:
 Name: Sophos Central APIs
 Email: apis@sophos.com

Whether the number of pages should be calculated and returned in the response.

The fields to return in a partial response.
Combination of query run status, result, and "with data" filter, delimited with a `:` (colon) symbol. E.g. `finished:succeeded:withData`, `finished:succeeded:withoutData`.
Combination of query run status, result, and "with data" filter, delimited with a `:` (colon) symbol. E.g. `finished:succeeded:withData`, `finished:succeeded:withoutData`.
